name: Blurg

trait.name: Aggressive
text: As a bonus action, Blurg can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Greataxe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 29
environment: underdark, mountain, grassland, forest, hill, arctic
